name: Christel House India
briefDescription: Christel House (CH) strives to transform the lives of impoverished children utilizing research-based best practices focusing on holistic human development. Beginning with a 320 students in Bangalore, today it caters to 1,210 students in 2 schools in India; in Bangalore & in Atal Nagar, Chhattisgarh. The medium of instruction is English & classes start from KG-Grade 12. CH uses a holistic model of education. Along with rigorous academics, complete health service and, breakfast, lunch, milk and an evening snack are provided daily. All graduates receive Scholarships & academic support to pursue their university education & job placements under the College & Careers Program. CH graduates are now working in top companies in India & Overseas.
